question: Choose between Kirishima and Iida
answer:
make me choose between:

Although I love both v much I have to go with my best boy Kirishima. He is my 2nd favorite character in the series after all!!


Thanks for the ask!

blog.name: bokunoheroandchill
blog.title: My Hero and Chill
blog.description: Hey there! I'm Bambi, I write drabbles and headcanons for BNHA! // Requests: OPEN // Commissions// Rules

tags: boku no hero academia x reader
summary:
Wrote these while waiting for the doctor lol
Izuku Midoriya
He loves all the affection!! Every time he sees you he's so ready to...
body:
Wrote these while waiting for the doctor lol

Izuku Midoriya

  • He loves all the affection!! Every time he sees you he’s so ready to be showered with love, and whenever you’re gone he can’t stop thinking about each kiss.
  • He really loves it when you hold his face in your hands, thumbs gently brushing against his freckled skin. It sends shivers down his spine, and puts a soft smile on his face.
  • You two have a nightly routine of saying goodnight to each other. Two kisses on the forehead, one on each cheek, a quick one to the nose, and a lasting one to the lips. Izuku finds he can’t sleep very well without it.
  • Izuku probably prefers your hugs the most, so he can wrap himself around you and hold you close. It’s also nice, he thinks, to just be held, and feel your skin against his.

Yuga Aoyama

  • If you expected this boy not to give all your love and affection right back, you have another thing coming. He loves giving affection just as much as you do, and whenever you try and hold him and pepper him with kisses he does the same
  • If you catch him off guard and start kissing him all over he’ll actually giggle as if it were ticklish. It’s the cutest sound and super endearing.
  • Loves your kisses the most, and fully encourages them by pointing to his cheek whenever he wants one or two… Or three or four.
  • If you wake him up to a barrage of kisses expect him to not only giggle, but pull you close and smoosh his face into your chest where he’ll breathe a heavy, happy sigh and cuddle you for as long as you’ll let him.

Fumikage Tokoyami

  • Poor baby gets super flustered by all of the attention, even when you’re in private. He’ll stutter, and clear his throat, and you know he’d be blushing up a storm if he could.
  • That isn’t to say he doesn’t like it though. In fact, he loves it. It lets him know how much you love and care for him, and plus it feels nice to be held by you.
  • Sometimes, when you’re holding him, he’ll place his head atop yours and gently nuzzle into you. It’s his form of kissing you all over, and his quiet way of saying I love you.
  • While he doesn’t necessarily say it, his bedtime kisses are his favorite. He’ll silently wait for them, always expecting at least 3, and always expecting a long hug after it where he’ll gently rub your back and whisper “I love you”

Like my work? Consider commissioning me!

blog.name: tobobio
blog.title: Bakubros
blog.description: i write Bakugou x reader scenarios. Ask box: CLOSED I try to post everyday. Art blog: momobuta

question: #73 please!
answer:
these little prompts are nice, some really make your heart jump out

Numero 73

“If anything ever happens to me, remember that I’ll always love you.”

Every morning Bakugou would never forget to press a kiss to your forehead before leaving for work. It had become a daily routine for him, it was a small message to let you know that he was leaving and coming back.

His line of work always worried you. Being a pro-hero always had its risks and you feared everyday that he wouldn’t come home. You always had your phone ready in your reach for any messages or the television would be on the news channel. And with Bakugou being so reckless, didn’t help with your anxiety anymore.

Some mornings you would try to wake up to be able to see him off. As you felt his lips brush against your forehead you stirred awake, tiredly gazing at your lover above you.

“Go back to sleep” he whispers. Though you object, pulling him down by his neck and pulling him for a kiss on the lips. You stay in each others embrace for a little longer, refusing to leave each others warmth.

But he had to go.

He pulled from your embrace and gathered his belongings and headed towards the door. You pouted slightly as you watched his back get further and further away from you.

“Katsuki” you call. He turns to look at you over his shoulder. “Be careful out there. I get worried” the expression on your face is sad like a puppy when it’s owner leaves.

Bakugou walks back to you, taking a seat on the edge of the bed. He takes your smaller hand in his larger one, and brings it up to his lips, pressing light kisses to your fingers. The action making your chest warm.

“Don’t worry” he tries to reassure you, but your uneasiness still sits. “But-”

“If anything ever happens to me, remember that I’ll always love you.” he cuts you off, capturing your lips again, this time in a more heated kiss filled with passion.

Pulling away, his eyes burn into your own, filled with love and reassurance. Your shoulders untense.

“Not like anything will happen to me. I’ll always come back home for you.”

tags: THESE AU'S ARE SO GOOD YALL SLEEPIN ON THIS
summary: last week i mentioned achilles!bakugou and patroclu!midoriya au but what about merlin au? bakugou as king arthur and midoriya as...
body:
last week i mentioned achilles!bakugou and patroclu!midoriya au but what about merlin au? bakugou as king arthur and midoriya as merlin (the tv show version where he hides that he’s a sorcerer)

“i thought i knew you” bakugou, when he finds out that midoriya could use magic

“you’ve done this before,” bakugou, when midoriya uses magic to help hide their location, “all these years and you’ve never once sought out credit.”

“that’s not why i do it,” says midoriya, as he turns and gives bakugou a meaningful look. “come on, let’s go.”

summary: My self made Bakugo bag :) for the first  time I tried a bag it looks kinda cool. x3 I hope it will look cool in use too XD

blog.name: tsfs-dragon
blog.title: In Dragon's Shoes
blog.description: Random thoughts for a random place

title: Chapter 208
body:
Man the Bakugo haters are really crazy. They say that the manga makes him “perfect” but have they really been reading the thing? Aside from his attitude problem he had since the beginning, he got caught by the sludge villain needed to be saved, in the Battle Trial lost to Deku, in the sports festival lost the race to Deku, lost the Cavalry Battle to Shoto, and even though he won the final battle it wasn’t on his terms as Shoto didn’t use his full power to fight, nearly failed the end of term exam if it wasn’t for Deku, got caught by the League of Villains needing to be saved again, to be one of 2 in class who failed to get his provisional hero license and needs to work harder to get it, and for a time suffered from guilt that because if himself that All Might had to retire.

Clearly this isn’t the kind of character who wins all the time his way and does no wrong. Chapter 208 really showed how he changed from back in the Battle Trial where he never considered Iida as someone to work with, and with the Cavalry Battle where the team was more than likely set up by Kirishima as Bakugo never took the time to remember his classmates’ powers. Now he is working with his classmates to get the mission done, yeah he still has his attitude but he put away that thought process he had of “I’m a one man army” kind of deal he had through most of the series. The reason class A won that battle is because class B never foresaw the possibility that Bakugo would do anything for his classmates.
